Banner.Description: I have 9 years of experience in designing and developing robust web applications. Proficient in Javascript/Typescript, Java and Python, applying good practices and development standards. Expertise in integrating AWS services and managing CI/CD pipelines. Strong background in cloud computing, containerization, and cross-platform mobile development.
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: In 9 years of experience I've covered many roles: Senior Full Stack Developer, backend developer, Full Stack Developer, and technical leader. I love contributing my knowledge to create new things that help solve problems.
My capabilities also include implementing improvements in systems, optimizing sites, standardizing patterns, and suggesting and executing ideas that add value to the project I'm working on.
I also program things for my personal use, whether as a hobby or for utility.
Some of the technologies that I have trained and worked on include (but are not limited to):
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Senior Fullstack developer
Description: Developed a real-time video streaming platform using Next.js, Nest.js, and Node.js.
Enhanced SEO, build processes with Rollup, Webpack, and Babel, and used Tailwind CSS and Material UI.
Built and maintained a mobile app with React Native.
Integrated WebRTC for peer-to-peer communication and RabbitMQ for messaging.
Designed real-time data streaming with Apache Kafka and used Prisma V2 for ORM.
Configured video stream servers, AWS Transcribe, and TensorFlow.
Integrated OAuth, JWT authentication, and various AWS services (S3, EC2, App Sync, RDS, Kinesis).
Managed source control with Git/GitHub and tracked projects using Trello.
Applied SOLID principles and design patterns, providing technical leadership and guidance.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Fullstack developer
Description: Developed an e-commerce platform with React, Typescript, Python, and Django.
Built mobile apps with React Native and implemented SEO strategies.
Created RESTful APIs and integrated Kafka for real-time data processing.
Managed databases with PostgreSQL and PostGIS.
Deployed Python applications on AWS services and configured CI/CD pipelines with Jenkins.
Used JIRA for project management and maintained compliance with PCI DSS.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Full Stack Developer
Description: Built a company website and social media platform using Angular and Java Spring Boot.
Developed macOS and iOS applications with Swift and SwiftUI.
Designed database solutions with Oracle and implemented serverless apps using AWS services.
Configured CI/CD pipelines, monitored applications with CloudWatch, and used AWS CLI for automation.
Implemented authentication with AWS Cognito and Auth2.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Junior FullStack developer
Description: Developed web applications with JavaScript, TypeScript, and React.js.
Created 3D web apps using Three.js and dynamic visualizations with D3.js.
Built backend systems with Node.js, Express.js, and used Ajax for data fetching.
Deployed cloud-based apps on Microsoft Azure and configured CI workflows with CircleCI.
Engaged in Agile methodologies and developed test suites with Cypress Testing Framework.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: I developed and maintained ShopthatStore's large-scale e-commerce platform, leveraging React with Typescript and Python/Django for robust performance and scalability. I spearheaded SEO efforts, integrated React Native for cross-platform mobile apps, managed PostgreSQL databases securely.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: TuneTank
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Monitoring application built from scratch with auth module, configurable graphs, configurable alarms, and user management. It also has reactive form logic for configuring parameters.

It has online chatcontact form, notification system by whatsapp and mail, auth, and internet information management through the role of administrator.
